title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories on the x axis representing Sex, and Share of respondents in each Sex on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Under 35 where Share of respondents is 7.0.
The lowest category is found at Male where Share of respondents is 2.0.
The highest value at Under 35 is almost 3.5 times larger than the minimum value of Male.
The highest value at Under 35 is almost 3.5 times larger than the minimum value of Male.
The difference between the max Sex Under 35 and min Sex Male is 5.0.
